channel.title: How do i make safe spots
channel.description: im my server i made a spot but it says its PVP is there a way i can make that cords a safe spot?

item.title: How do i make safe spots
item.dc:creator: @Da_Vinci Da Vinci
item.description:
@Da_Vinci wrote:

[quote=“IfearI, post:10, topic:350491”][quote author=Da Vinci link=topic=446854.msg3279752#msg3279752 date=1279789316]

IsInWilderness? Isn’t that making it Wildy instead of safe?

Nop those are the safe spots, atleast that’s how my source works
Did you try it and get that it made it wildy?
[/quote]

If I add the coords to the public boolean IsInWilderniss it makes wilderniss in my sources just tested it.[/quote]

Alright, if it doesn’t work with inWild then try public boolean isInPvP with the same method.

EDIT:

From what he says Im assuming hes using a PVP source, and thats why he needs to use the public boolean isinPvP not inWild.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make safe spots

item.source: How do i make safe spots

item.title: How do i make safe spots
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

[quote=“Da Vinci, post:7, topic:350491”]Okay, I had the exact same problem, this is how you do it:

Search client.java for

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {

You should see something like

if ((coordY >= 3490) && (coordY <= 3493) && (coordX <= 2730) && (coordX >= 2721) ||

Now you must copy paste the thing and add in the coordinates to where you want the safe spot to be

if ((coordY >= YYYY) && (coordY <= YYYY) && (coordX <= XXXX) && (coordX >= XXXX)

Replace the YYYY with the Y-Coordinates and the XXXX with the X-Coordinates.

So in the end you should have something like

if ((coordY >= 3490) && (coordY <= 3493) && (coordX <= 2730) && (coordX >= 2721) || if ((coordY >= 3490) && (coordY <= 3493) && (coordX <= 2730) && (coordX >= 2721)

I think that’ll do the trick, glad to help

Leo[/quote]

IsInWilderness? Isn’t that making it Wildy instead of safe?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make safe spots

item.title: How do i make safe spots
item.dc:creator: @Da_Vinci Da Vinci
item.description:
@Da_Vinci wrote:

Okay, I had the exact same problem, this is how you do it:

Search client.java for

public boolean isInPvP(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {

You should see something like

if ((coordY >= 3490) && (coordY <= 3493) && (coordX <= 2730) && (coordX >= 2721) ||

Now you must copy paste the thing and add in the coordinates to where you want the safe spot to be

if ((coordY >= YYYY) && (coordY <= YYYY) && (coordX <= XXXX) && (coordX >= XXXX)

Replace the YYYY with the Y-Coordinates and the XXXX with the X-Coordinates.

So in the end you should have something like

if ((coordY >= 3490) && (coordY <= 3493) && (coordX <= 2730) && (coordX >= 2721) || if ((coordY >= 3490) && (coordY <= 3493) && (coordX <= 2730) && (coordX >= 2721)

I think that’ll do the trick, glad to help

Leo

Read full topic
